title: New Limar Air Stratos road/gravel helmet is light, airy & affordable
content:
Need a lightweight brain bucket for gravel and adventure rides? Check out Limar’s new Air Stratos helmet.  A size medium tips the scale at a claimed 240g, and a size large weighs a reported ten grams more. But there’s more to it than just a low weight…   It’s not the lightest helmet Limar’s ever

The post New Limar Air Stratos road/gravel helmet is light, airy & affordable appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Sam Anderson
